reviewText: I just really like the entire series.  Dropped cable tv a ways back so this was the second tv series I have streamed and throughly enjoy it.  Just feel each character is perfectly cast.
We really enjoyed the movies. It was nice to see a Sce-Fi series have some great special effects. And a few cliff hangers!
awesome! cant wait for season 4 to be released.
Great Christmas gift.  I don't watch the show but the recipient does and I got 2 thumbs up for this buy.
Just what I needed, good watching.
Fantastic movie!!! Actors are super-excelents...I love it, it came with Spanish Subtitles...
Great Show at a Great Price!
A very good series, I enjoy it immensely.

My wife and I have enjoyed Falling Skies over the last month as we caught up with all of the episodes.  It has been getting better with each season.  The storyline, character development, and acting started a bit rocky, but improved quite a bit with each episode.

A decent SF series with great aliens and very good FX.
The storyline is very predictable and I guess you would say standard.  The acting is ok but very formulaic.

The only serious problem w/ the series is that credibility is lacking when you think about the shortcomings of the alien invaders who have decimated 90% of the human population yet lack basic night vision/thermal sensing technology and things such as this.

Although I get the impression they would like to have a product comparable to the Battlestar Galactica rebook, the writers are clearly producing product geared for the adolescent mindset.  That said, it's still entertaining.
to much like walking dead with aliens; not enough aliens too much soap opera
